# Paragon Pool & Spa

> Family-owned pool, spa, and sauna specialists serving the Twin Cities metro area for over 35 years. A+ BBB rated.

## Business Information

- Name: Paragon Pool & Spa
- Legal Name: Paragon Pool and Patio, Inc.
- Type: Home and Construction Business (Pool, Spa, Sauna)
- Owner: Mike Henry, President
- Founded: April 1, 1990
- BBB Rating: A+ (Accredited since 1998)
- Phone: (651) 653-6807
- Email: sales@paragonpoolandspa.com
- Website: https://www.paragonpoolandspa.com

## Locations

### Willernie Showroom (Primary)
- Address: 305 Stillwater Road, Willernie, MN 55090
- Phone: (651) 653-6807

### Stillwater Location
- Address: 1280 Frontage Rd W, Stillwater, MN 55082
- Phone: (651) 439-5632

### Forest Lake Location
- Address: 1148 W Broadway Ave, Forest Lake, MN 55025
- Phone: (651) 464-4401

### Hours (All Locations)
- Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Saturday: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
- Sunday: 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM

## Services

- Custom Inground Pool Design & Construction (gunite, vinyl, fiberglass)
- Above Ground Pool Installation & Repair
- Hot Tub & Spa Sales and Installation
- Sauna Installation (traditional Finnish and infrared)
- Pool Renovation & Remodeling
- Vinyl Pool Liner Replacement
- Automatic Pool Cover Installation (Cover Star, SwimWise)
- Pool Maintenance & Service Plans (weekly, seasonal)
- Equipment Sales & Repair
- Pool & Spa Water Testing
- Salt System Sales & Repair
- Outdoor Living & Landscaping Design
- Concrete & Patio Work
- Fencing Services

## Products

- Hot Tubs & Spas (2-person to 8-person, swim spas)
- Saunas (traditional, infrared, barrel)
- Pool Equipment: Hayward, Pentair, Latham, Polaris, Zodiac
- Automatic Covers: Cover Star, SwimWise
- Accessories: S.R. Smith (ladders, rails), Interfab (diving boards)
- Pool & Spa Chemicals
- Billiard Tables & Supplies
- Patio Furniture

## Service Area

Willernie, Mahtomedi, White Bear Lake, Stillwater, Forest Lake, Woodbury, Maplewood, North St. Paul, Oakdale, Lake Elmo, Hugo, Blaine, Minnetonka, and the greater Twin Cities metropolitan area in Minnesota.

## Key Facts

- 35+ years in business (founded 1990)
- Mike Henry has 50+ years of pool industry experience
- Owner is on-site for every project
- Three showroom locations in the east Twin Cities metro
- Family-owned and operated
- A+ BBB rating since 1998
- Free in-home estimates available
- Financing options available
- Uses only the highest quality products at competitive prices
